column4: Guys,I DON'T have: "System → Administration → Network" (I have ubuntu 8.10 and also kubunutu and xubuntu installed) where is it and how can I change my computer name and network name
and have you look to see if Network  menu item is in there?
what version of ubuntu? your menus are different to mine 8.04
have you tried editing  /etc/hostname and /etc/hosts then, can help with the menus and they must be different in 8.10
